title: Understanding Diagnostic Tools
text: Dissociative disorders are complex and require specific tools for accurate diagnosis. These tools help clinicians assess the presence and severity of dissociative symptoms.

title: Common Diagnostic Tools
text: There are specific scales and interviews designed to evaluate dissociative disorders. These tools are widely used in clinical settings.

hintAnswer: Dissociative Experiences Scale (DES) or the Structured Clinical Interview for Dissociative Disorders $$(SCID-D)$$
